41 namespace moveit {
42 namespace task_constructor {
43 namespace solvers {
44 
45 PlannerInterface::PlannerInterface() {
46  auto& p = properties();
47  p.declare<double>("max_velocity_scaling_factor", 1.0, "scale down max velocity by this factor");
48  p.declare<double>("max_acceleration_scaling_factor", 1.0, "scale down max acceleration by this factor");
49 }
50 }
51 }
52 } // namespace moveit
